main event: A UFO was observed emitting light and was stationary for 12 minutes at an estimated distance of 1,500-2,000 yards on 4 July 1963.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 7:30 AM local time,The object was reported to bring itself to a horizontal position as it approached the observer,The object disappeared suddenly after being observed,The object was estimated to have a bearing of 185 degrees and an altitude not specified,This report is classified as unclassified under Project Blue Book.
